subject: YOUR ATM DEBIT CARD PAYMENT Valued: US$5.300, 000. 00
body:
From the Desk of Rev. Eric Anderson
Director ATM CARD Department of
United Bank for Africa (UBA)
Direct Line: +234-8065 22 3257


Attention:

This is Rev Eric Anderson from UBA United Bank for Africa (UBA), please I’m contacting you in regards to the mail received from federal Republic of Nigeria to release a total sum of $5.3million USD approved on your behalf for your contract/inheritance outstanding payment via ATM Master card.

Be advice that we will proceed on this transaction if only you can provide to us request information as stated below.

(1) Full Name....
(2) Address ...
(3) Telephone and Fax.....
(4) Occupation and Age.....
(5) Your passport or driving license......

We look forward to hear from you ASAP

May the blessing of the almighty God be with you. We look forward to hear from you urgently.
Yours Sincerely
Rev. Eric Anderson

subject: Re: YOUR ATM DEBIT CARD PAYMENT Valued: US$5.300, 000. 00
body:
Hello Rev. Eric Anderson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of the approved funds. I appreciate your prompt response and willingness to assist.

Before I provide you with the requested information, could you please clarify a few things for me? Firstly, how was I selected to receive this contract payment? Secondly, what is the total amount of funds that have been approved on my behalf?

I want to ensure that all the necessary details are in order before proceeding further. Your assistance in providing these clarifications would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you once again, and may God bless you too.

Best wishes,
Linette
